title: Bid update and other notification functionality in eBay's applications may not occur in real time.

tosdr.case: [Bad]  Bid update and other notification functionality in eBay's applications may not occur in real time because of functionality outside of eBay's control.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  Bid update and other notification functionality in eBay's applications may not occur in real time because of functionality outside of eBay's control.
